org.mortbay.jetty
Class AbstractGenerator.OutputWriter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Writer
      org.mortbay.jetty.AbstractGenerator.OutputWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpConnection.OutputWriter
Enclosing class:
AbstractGenerator
public static class AbstractGenerator.OutputWriter
extends java.io.Writer

OutputWriter. A writer that can wrap a AbstractGenerator.Output stream and provide character encodings. The UTF-8 encoding is done by this class and no additional buffers or Writers are used. The UTF-8 code was inspired by http://javolution.org
